Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra » Nakammaduka
Terasaka
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Nakammaduka
Terasaka
1230Nakammapaccayā nahetupaccayā…pe…  napurejātapaccayā napacchājātapaccayā naāsevane ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā ekaṃ, novigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1231Navipākapaccayā… . (Yathā nahetumūlakaṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
